title: Start
body:
Player: This is the first node!
Other Player: This has a : in it.
<<set $test to 1>>

[[Go to the next node|NextNode]]
[[No Thanks|NoThanks]]
[[Shortcut Branching|ShortCut]]

title: NextNode
body:
Player: This is the next node.
<<if $test == 1>>
Not Player: We should see this.
<<endif>>
